verses.verse: And <WG2532> straightway <WG2112> in <WG1909> the <WG3588> morning <WG4404> the <WG3588> chief priests <WG749> held <WG4160> a consultation <WG4824> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> elders <WG4245> and <WG2532> scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> whole <WG3650> council, <WG4892> and bound <WG1210> Jesus, <WG2424> and carried him away, <WG667> and <WG2532> delivered <WG3860> him to Pilate. <WG4091>

And <WG1161> there was <WG2258> one named <WG3004> Barabbas, <WG912> which lay bound <WG1210> with <WG3326> them that had made insurrection with him, <WG4955> who <WG3748> had committed <WG4160> murder <WG5408> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> insurrection. <WG4714>

Then <WG1161> Pilate <WG4091> said <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Why, <WG1063> what <WG5101> evil <WG2556> hath he done? <WG4160> And <WG1161> they <WG3588> cried out <WG2896> the more exceedingly, <WG4056> Crucify <WG4717> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> with <WG4862> him <WG846> they crucify <WG4717> two <WG1417> thieves; <WG3027> the one <WG1520> on <WG1537> his right hand, <WG1188> and <WG2532> the other <WG1520> on <WG1537> his <WG846> left. <WG2176>

And <WG1161> when the sixth <WG1623> hour <WG5610> was come, <WG1096> there was <WG1096> darkness <WG4655> over <WG1909> the <WG3588> whole <WG3650> land <WG1093> until <WG2193> the ninth <WG1766> hour. <WG5610>
